sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		CARGO_ID as string,
		F_HOLD_DAMAGE as string,
		HD_CODE as string,
		HD_GROUP_CODE as string,
		HD_START_DATETIME as string,
		HD_END_DATETIME as string,
		IS_OPEN_HOLD as string,
		IS_CLOSED_HOLD as string,
		CARGO_ID as string,
		F_HOLD_DAMAGE as string,
		HD_CODE as string,
		HD_GROUP_CODE as string,
		HD_START_DATETIME as string,
		HD_END_DATETIME as string,
		IS_OPEN_HOLD as string,
		IS_CLOSED_HOLD as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		CARGO_ID,
		F_HOLD_DAMAGE,
		HD_CODE,
		HD_GROUP_CODE,
		HD_START_DATETIME,
		HD_END_DATETIME,
		IS_OPEN_HOLD,
		IS_CLOSED_HOLD
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
